definition: to do research/to carry out research

sentences.english: Jia-wen Luo do the experimental investigation and make a research summary and finish the research report.
sentences.chinese: 由罗家文进行实验探究并将成果汇总并制成研究报告。

sentences.english: The results have important guiding significance on the production safety of fertilizer-related enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果对相关化肥企业的安全生产有指导意义。

sentences.english: The relationship between bond valence and bond covalency has been investigated by a semiempirical method.
sentences.chinese: 方法研究了固体材料中键电荷与键共价性的关系。

sentences.english: An application that can run statics analysis on sports matches .
sentences.chinese: 一个应用程序可以运行在体育静力学的研究与分析。

sentences.english: Idealized research methods to solve the historiography of measurement was first crisis.
sentences.chinese: 理想化的研究方法首先解决了计量史学的危机。

sentences.english: For the study, published in the September issue of Pediatrics, researchers identified 28 babies who spent time in the NICU and were later diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在九月份的《儿科》杂志上面。

sentences.english: Hanna, female, a master graduate in vacuum and fluid engineering center.
sentences.chinese: 韩娜，女，真空与流体工程研究中心硕士研究生。

sentences.english: Hanna, female, a master graduate in vacuum and fluid engineering center.
sentences.chinese: 韩娜，女，真空与流体工程研究中心硕士研究生。

sentences.english: Further eytogenetic analysis and breeding utilization of this intergeneric hybrid are still being carried out.
sentences.chinese: 目前正进一步开展细胞遗传和育种利用研究。

sentences.english: Nathan noted that the study can't prove that smoking causes diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 内森说此项研究不能证明吸烟会导致糖尿病。

sentences.english: Context is the most frequently studied theme in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 语境是当前语用学研究的一个热点。

sentences.english: The paper studies dynamic characteristic for industrial steam turbine digital electro hydraulic governing system.
sentences.chinese: 研究了工业汽轮机数字电液调节系统的动态特性。

sentences.english: And, of course, the research into pain continues.
sentences.chinese: 当然，对痛苦的研究仍在继续。

sentences.english: Therefore, the dissertation concentrates on the research of localization in WSNs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本论文围绕无线传感器网络定位技术展开研究。

sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 专家称，这项研究应该促使各国重新考虑药品的分类。

sentences.english: The paper studied 7 case Masked civet of dystocia in farm condition.
sentences.chinese: 本文对7例在养殖条件下难产的花面狸进行了研究。
